fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries
eu_initiatives:
Member of the "Marine knowledge expert group" (MARE.A). 
This group provides the Commission with scientific, technical and operational expertise on matters concerning marine observation and data.
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
membership:
WWF (www.wwf.it) 
International Union for Conservation of Nature - IUCN (www.iucn.org)
goals__remit:
Shoreline cooperative was established in 1988 by a group of young marine biologists involved  
in environmental conservation. Its main activity is providing services to marine protected areas.  
In 1996 its own office and laboratory were opened at AREA Science Park (Trieste, Italy).  
Shoreline is quality certified (UNI EN ISO 9001:2000), is recognised as a High Qualified Laboratory from the Ministry of Education, University and Research and is authorized for running research activity in the field of fisheries and aquaculture by the Ministry for Agriculture.  
The staff is composed mainly of biologists, but also geologists, sociologists, architects, lawyers.
